units.label: Box breath • 10 sec
units.intro: You're doing your best. One small breath cycle together.
outro: Nice. Notice one spot in your body that feels 1% softer.

units.label: 3-2-1 senses • 10 sec
outro: That counts. A micro step is still a step.

units.label: 5-4-3-2-1 • 1 min
units.intro: Let’s land in the room together.

steps.text: 4 things you can feel (skin, fabric, chair).
3 things you can hear, near or far.
2 things you can smell or recall smelling.
1 thing you can taste or imagine tasting.

outro: Good. If it helped a little, that’s enough for now.

units.label: Paced breath 4–4–6 • 1 min
units.intro: We’ll do gentle cycles. Adjust pace if you need.
outro: Notice your shoulders or jaw. Can they drop 2%?

units.label: Mini body scan • 2 min
units.intro: Two quiet minutes. You can stop anytime.

steps.text: Eyes: soften your gaze, even if closed.
Jaw: unhook your teeth, place tongue wide.
Shoulders: let gravity do 1% more of the work.
Hands: loosen each finger, palm warm and heavy.
Belly: allow a slower, wider inhale.
Exhale a little longer than you inhale.
Thighs + calves: notice the contact with chair or floor.
Feet: feel heel, arch, toes in order.

outro: How’s the room feel now—1% different is still different.

units.label: Longer paced breath • 2 min
units.intro: Slow and kind. If dizzy, return to normal breathing.
outro: If you want, we can do another round—or take the next step.
